metadata.name: Creation of a Diagcab
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of diagcab file, which could be caused by some legitimate installer or is a sign of exploitation (review the filename and its location)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.diagcab')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of diagcab file, which could be caused by some legitimate installer or is a sign of exploitation (review the filename and its location)

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate microsoft diagcab Reference: https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1533879688141086720.html
